childMarkdownRemark.html: We pride ourselves on our ability to extricate such very large and dangerous trees while doing no damage to the fine surroundings.
childMarkdownRemark.excerpt: We pride ourselves on our ability to extricate such very large and dangerous trees while doing no damage to the fine surroundings.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Although we are not fond of removing trees unless it is truly necessary, we are unusually good at difficult removals in tight spaces.

As an urban company, we are all too familiar with large dying or dead alianthus trees, locusts or silver maples located in tiny backyards surrounded with windows, fine gardens, with prize plants, and with fish ponds.

We pride ourselves on our ability to extricate such very large and dangerous trees while doing no damage to the fine surroundings.
